name: Name
aboutP1: My name is Tiago Souza de Oliveira, a passionate Fullstack Developer with a solid background in Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, SQL, NodeJS, ReactJS, Linux and Docker. Originally from Brazil, I have worked in various areas, standing out as a Service Desk at Yel Informatica, providing bilingual technical support for Stellantis employees and dealers in Argentina and Brazil. My experience also includes roles as Warehouse Assistant at Medical Implants S.A., where I managed the reception, control and dispatch of medical instruments and equipment.
aboutP2: Throughout my career, I have cultivated specialized skills in technologies like JavaScript and React.js, as well as implementing test-driven development (TDD) practices. My HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Linux course certifications reflect my commitment to continuous improvement and excellence in my field.
aboutP3: In addition to my work experience, I am immersed in a Full Stack Web Developer program at Henry, where I am expanding my skills and knowledge. My approach goes beyond writing code; I seek to contribute to innovative and efficient solutions.
aboutP4: This project is a manifestation of my passion for technology and web development. Through this platform, I am excited to share my experience and knowledge in the world of development. You can contact me through my phone number +54 9 11 2705-0682, my email tiago.zdo@gmail.com, or connect with me on LinkedIn and GitHub.
site_banner1: Explore the Rick and Morty universe in stunning detail.
site_features2: It allows users to explore a wide variety of characters from the Rick and Morty universe, with details such as names, species, life status, etc.
site_features4: Gives users the ability to perform advanced searches to find specific characters, episodes, or locations based on different criteria (e.g. name, season, etc.).
site_features6: Allows users to save their favorite characters to a custom list for easy access in the future.
site_features8: We ensure that the user interface is easy to use and that navigation is intuitive so that users can quickly access the information they are looking for.
site_testimonials1: This app is wonderful! I'm a huge Rick and Morty fan and this app makes it super easy to explore all the characters and episodes. I definitely recommend it!
site_testimonials3: I never thought I would find such a complete application about Rick and Morty. The ability to search by characters, episodes, and locations is impressive. It's a must have for any fan!
site_testimonials5: This app has saved me a lot of time when searching for information about the series. The details of the characters and episodes are very well organized. I am hooked!
site_prices2: Start your free trial. No credit card required.
